entry.title: Wing FTP Server NULL-byte Authentication Bypass
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Wing FTP Server NULL-byte Authentication Bypass

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2025-47812

漏洞类型： 命令执行

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： Wing FTP Server 存在一个通过NULL字节（%00）截断漏洞（CVE-2025-47812）的Lua代码注入问题。提供%00作为用户名，使得C++认证例程仅验证前缀，而完整字符串未经过滤写入会话文件，随后以root/SYSTEM权限执行，导致远程代码执行。

产品厂商： Wing FTP Server

产品名称： Wing FTP Server

来源： https://github.com/rapid7/metasploit-framework/blob/5b268bd4b408e61e5fb8479823fbe72d670d3110/modules%2Fexploits%2Fmulti%2Fhttp%2Fwingftp_null_byte_rce.rb

类型： rapid7/metasploit-framework:github issues

POC详情
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Wing FTP Server NULL-byte Authenticatio

entry.title: Cisco IOS Smart Install 缓冲区溢出漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Cisco IOS Smart Install 缓冲区溢出漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2018-0171

漏洞类型： 缓冲区溢出

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： Cisco IOS和IOS XE软件中的Smart Install协议存在缓冲区溢出漏洞。未经身份验证的远程攻击者可以通过向受影响设备的TCP端口4786发送特制的Smart Install消息来利用此漏洞。成功利用此漏洞可能导致攻击者在受影响的设备上造成缓冲区溢出，进而可能导致任意代码执行、拒绝服务（设备重新启动）或使设备陷入消耗CPU资源的无限循环中。

产品厂商： Cisco

产品名称： Cisco IOS

搜索语法： cpe:”cpe:2.3:o:cisco:ios”

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/e5d3813f4180c7cf83ee4729ebd2654f61cdc178/network%2Fcves%2F2018%2FCVE-2018-0171.yaml

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

POC详情
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Cisco IOS Smart Install 缓冲区溢出漏洞

entry.title: Apache Dubbo 反序列化漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Apache Dubbo 反序列化漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2019-17564

漏洞类型： 反序列化

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： Apache Dubbo 2.7.0至2.7.4、2.6.0至2.6.7以及所有2.5.x版本中存在反序列化漏洞，原因是接受HTTP POST请求中的不受信任的Java对象，如果启用了HTTP，攻击者可以完全控制Provider实例，利用此漏洞需要攻击者发送恶意的Java对象。

产品厂商： Apache

产品名称： Dubbo

影响版本： 2.5.x, 2.6.0 <= version <= 2.6.7, 2.7.0 <= version <= 2.7.4

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/issues/12444

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

来源概述

Description:

Apache Dubbo versions 2.7.0 to 2.7.4, 2.6.0 to 2.6.7, and all 2.5.x versions contain an insecure deserialization caused by accepting untrusted Java objects in HTTP POST requests, letting attackers fully compromise a Provider instance if HTTP is enabled, exploit requires attacker to send malicious Java object.

Severity: Critical
POC:
  • https://github.com/fairyming/CVE-2019-17564
  • https://github.com/Dor-Tumarkin/CVE-2019-17564-FastJson-Gadget
  • https://github.com/Exploit-3389/CVE-2019-17564
  • https://github.com/Hu3sky/CVE-2019-17564
  • https://github.com/Jaky5155/CVE-2019-17564
  • https://github.com/r00t4dm/CVE-2019-17564

KEV: True

Shodan Query: NA

Acceptance Criteria: The template must include a complete POC and should not rely solely on version-based detection. Contributors are required to provide debug data(-debug) along with the template to help the triage team with validation or can also share a vulnerable environment like docker file.

Rewards will only be given once the template is fully validated by the team. Templates that are incomplete or invalid will not be accepted. Avoid adding code templates for CVEs that can be achieved using HTTP, TCP, or JavaScript. Such templates are blocked by default and won’t produce results, so we prioritize creating templates with other protocols unless exceptions are made.

You can check the FAQ for the Nuclei Templates Community Rewards Program here.
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Apache Dubbo 反序列化漏洞

漏洞编号

entry.title: Cisco IOS Smart Install Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Cisco IOS Smart Install Buffer Overflow Vulnerability

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2018-0171

漏洞类型： 缓冲区溢出

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： Cisco IOS和IOS XE软件中的Smart Install功能存在缓冲区溢出漏洞，由于对Smart Install数据包的不当验证，未经认证的远程攻击者可通过向TCP端口4786发送特制的Smart Install消息，触发设备重启、执行任意代码或导致无限循环。

产品厂商： Cisco

产品名称： Cisco IOS and IOS XE Software

搜索语法： cpe:”cpe:2.3:o:cisco:ios”

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/issues/12325

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

来源概述

Description:

Cisco IOS and IOS XE Software contain a buffer overflow caused by improper validation of Smart Install packet data, letting unauthenticated remote attackers trigger device reload, execute arbitrary code, or cause indefinite loops, exploit requires sending crafted Smart Install message on TCP port 4786.

Severity: Critical
POC:
  • https://vulncheck.com/xdb/6d4b443f23fc
  • https://github.com/AlrikRr/Cisco-Smart-Exploit
  • https///github.com:AlrikRr/Cisco-Smart-Exploit.git

KEV: True

Shodan Query: cpe:"cpe:2.3:o:cisco:ios"

Acceptance Criteria: The template must include a complete POC and should not rely solely on version-based detection. Contributors are required to provide debug data(-debug) along with the template to help the triage team with validation or can also share a vulnerable environment like docker file.

Rewards will only be given once the template is fully validated by the team. Templates that are incomplete or invalid will not be accepted. Avoid adding code templates for CVEs that can be achieved using HTTP, TCP, or JavaScript. Such templates are blocked by default and won’t produce results, so we prioritize creating templates with other protocols unless exceptions are made.

You can check the FAQ for the Nuclei Templates Community Rewards Program here.
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Cisco IOS Smart Install Buffer Overflow

entry.title: Apache Tomcat HTTP/2 DoS Vulnerability
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Apache Tomcat HTTP/2 DoS Vulnerability

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2025-31650

漏洞类型： 拒绝服务

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： Apache Tomcat HTTP/2 DoS漏洞（CVE-2025-31650）允许攻击者通过发送畸形的priority头来触发内存耗尽条件，影响Apache Tomcat的多个版本。此漏洞可能导致服务不可用。

产品厂商： Apache

产品名称： Apache Tomcat

影响版本： 9.0.76 – 9.0.102, 10.1.10 – 10.1.39, 11.0.0-M2 – 11.0.5

来源： https://github.com/B1gN0Se/Tomcat-CVE-2025-31650

类型： CVE-2025:github search

仓库文件

  • PoC.py
  • README.md

来源概述

TomcatKiller - CVE-2025-31650

🚨 Proof of Concept (PoC) for Apache Tomcat HTTP/2 DoS vulnerability (CVE-2025-31650)

This script triggers a memory exhaustion condition in Apache Tomcat by sending malformed priority headers over HTTP/2.

🎯 Affected Versions

  • Apache Tomcat 9.0.76 – 9.0.102
  • Apache Tomcat 10.1.10 – 10.1.39
  • Apache Tomcat 11.0.0-M2 – 11.0.5

⚙️ Features

  • ✔️ HTTP/2 support verification
  • ✔️ Server header inspection (detect Tomcat)
  • ✔️ --check-only mode (non-intrusive)
  • ✔️ Async-based scalable exploit with adjustable intensity

🚀 Usage

✅ Check-only (safe detection)

💥 Exploit (DoS)

🧩 Arguments

ParameterDescription
--targetFull target URL with protocol and port
--check-onlyOnly test if the server supports HTTP/2 & Tomcat
--exploitRun the actual DoS attack
--tasksNumber of async tasks (default: 50)
--requestsRequests per task (default: 5000)

⚠️ Disclaimer

This PoC is for educational and authorized security testing only.
Do not use it against systems without explicit permission.
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Apache Tomcat HTTP/2 DoS Vulnerabi

entry.title: Microsoft Outlook 远程代码执行漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Microsoft Outlook 远程代码执行漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2024-21413

漏洞类型： 命令执行

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： Microsoft Outlook 存在远程代码执行漏洞，攻击者可以通过构造特殊的Moniker Link来利用此漏洞，导致在目标系统上执行任意代码。此漏洞被标记为严重级别，影响Microsoft Outlook的安全性。

entry.title: Sudo chroot 本地权限提升漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Sudo chroot 本地权限提升漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2025-32463

漏洞类型： 权限提升

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： 该漏洞存在于sudo的--chroot选项中，允许攻击者通过精心构造的nsswitch.conf文件加载恶意的NSS模块，从而获得root shell访问权限。影响版本为1.9.14至1.9.17。

产品厂商： sudo.ws

产品名称： sudo

影响版本： 1.9.14 <= version <= 1.9.17

来源： https://github.com/Adonijah01/cve-2025-32463-lab

类型： CVE-2025:github search

仓库文件

  • Dockerfile
  • README.md
  • sudo-chwoot.sh

来源概述

CVE-2025-32463 – Sudo chroot Local Privilege Escalation Lab

This repository contains a Docker-based lab and proof-of-concept exploit for CVE-2025-32463, a local privilege escalation vulnerability in sudo (versions 1.9.14 to 1.9.17).

🚨 Disclaimer

This code is for educational and authorized testing purposes only. Do not use on systems you do not own or have explicit permission to test.

Lab Features

  • Vulnerable Ubuntu 24.04 container with sudo 1.9.15p5
  • Non-privileged user (labuser)
  • Exploit script: sudo-chwoot.sh
  • Dockerfile for easy setup

Quick Start

Inside the container:

Exploit Overview

The exploit abuses the --chroot option in sudo and a crafted nsswitch.conf to load a malicious NSS module, resulting in root shell access.

Reference

  • Sudo Security Advisory
  • CVE-2025-32463 in the CVE database
  • Stratascale Advisory - Original research and PoC concept

Credits

Exploit concept and vulnerability details referenced from the official Sudo advisory, CVE database, and Stratascale’s research.

Stay safe and use responsibly!
